siteConfig.tagline: Raising beautiful, healthy cats with love
siteConfig.introText: Welcome to My Cattery, where we raise happy, healthy cats in a loving home environment. Each of our cats is treated as family, with top-quality care, regular veterinary checkups, and plenty of socialization. We are passionate about the breeds we work with and strive to produce kittens with wonderful temperaments.

heroImages.alt: Beautiful cat relaxing in a sunny room
Elegant cat posing on a cozy blanket

galleryImages.caption: Taro relaxing in his favorite spot
Mochi playing with a feather toy

contact.note: We prefer inquiries via email or Instagram DM. Please include your name, location, and which kitten you're interested in. We typically respond within 24 hours.

about.philosophy: At My Cattery, we believe every kitten deserves the best start in life. Our cats are raised in our home as part of the family — never in cages. We prioritize health, temperament, and socialization above all else. Every kitten leaves with full health records, a starter kit, and a lifetime of support from us.

breeds.description: The British Shorthair is one of the oldest and most beloved cat breeds, known for their round faces, dense plush coats, and calm, easygoing nature. They are the teddy bears of the cat world — sturdy, affectionate, and wonderfully low-maintenance companions.
traits: Great with children and other pets
Dense, plush coat in many colors

breeds.description: Ragdolls are large, gentle cats famous for going limp when picked up — hence the name. They are incredibly social, often following their owners from room to room like loyal puppies. With their striking blue eyes and silky semi-long coats, they are as beautiful as they are affectionate.
traits: Stunning blue eyes and pointed coloring
